scripts:
set ACL on /content 
 allow jcr:read for fedexsite_read 
 end

set ACL on /content/dam/fedexsite 
 allow jcr:read for fedexsite_read 
 end

set ACL on /var 
 allow jcr:read for fedexsite_read 
 end

set ACL on /tmp 
 allow jcr:read for fedexsite_read 
 end

set ACL on /etc 
 allow jcr:read for fedexsite_read 
 end

set ACL on /conf 
 allow jcr:read for fedexsite_read 
 end

set ACL on /content 
 allow jcr:all for fedexsite_read 
 end

set ACL on /content/dam/fedexsite 
 allow jcr:all for fedexsite_write 
 end

set ACL on /var 
 allow jcr:all for fedexsite_write 
 end

set ACL on /tmp 
 allow jcr:all for fedexsite_write 
 end

set ACL on /conf 
 allow jcr:all for fedexsite_write 
 end

set ACL on /etc 
 allow jcr:all for fedexsite_write 
 end
